How do you get hte pheonix feather!!!!??????????
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Expeditions: Kawrea: How do you get hte pheonix feather!!!!??????????
By zekido on Tuesday, July 18, 2000 - 09:51 pm:

I have heard that people got pheonix in the this site a'lout and I was woundering how do you get it.I know you get the pheonix feather in the kawrea expedition (sorry for my spelling errors) .butwhen i went to the volcanoe where the pheonix comes out I only fond (I fond every item in the volcanoe)2 arrowhead disc chips,magic bannana,pixie disc chips and a dandelion.so
please help!!!!!!!

By Tony on Wednesday, July 19, 2000 - 04:26 am:

Could be your monster's INT is low, or you haven't made a 2nd visit to the Kawrea expedition. If you only went once, you're not going to find it. Go back a 2nd time time, and everything has changed.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Wednesday, July 19, 2000 - 01:45 pm:

I have to disagree with you in this, Tony. It _is_ possible to find the Phoenix feather on the first trip to the volcano, as both my SO and I can attest to (me with a Mocchi of 300 or so int, him with a suezo with closer to 450). In fact, it's probably easier to find it on the first trip, without havnig to weave all the way around to the burned-out altar.

By PezCat on Friday, July 21, 2000 - 02:42 pm:

I concur with Kurasu on this. My first monster ever, Weeble, a Fake Penguin (Mocchi/Tiger)
was at about 300 INT and 280 LIF for the trip, and the Phoenix Feather was the first thing I
found, period.

Also, from what I've heard here, as well as what I've seen from my fellow MR players out
here, it is much more difficult if you don't get it before the mountain blows up. Almost every
one of my friends out here who has had a phoenix got the monster on their first trip to
Kawrea. Anyone who didn't still hasn't even gotten a single feather.

PezCat

By torey_luvullo on Friday, July 21, 2000 - 02:55 pm:

my daughter also found the feather very early, on a first trip to kawrea, with a monster with low int as well [for sure <250]. then her friend promptly saved over the file! and like pezcat says, shes been looking for another one ever since.

By Leon on Tuesday, August 29, 2000 - 02:43 pm:

I got the fire feather in my 1st try with a Golem with 45 int in first try its not imposible with a dumb monster.

I got it with a 400 int Prince Hare. He also has one of the parents of my phoenixs.
